Avarkal allahvutaiya arulaiyum, avanutaiya tirupporuttattaiyum ataiyak karuti (tankal uyiraiyum porulaiyum tiyakam ceytu) allahvukkum avanutaiya tutarukkum utavi ceytu kontirukkinranar.
